name: Spider Solitaire ‏‏‎‎‎‎
description:
Spider Solitaire by Tripledot Studios is the new best way to play the classic card game you know and love for FREE, offline and online!
A fun, challenging twist on the more common card games of Solitaire (like Klondike Solitaire, Patience, Freecell or Tripeaks), with more cards and different rules, Spider Solitaire is a great way to relax and train your brain at the same time. With beautiful graphics, fun animations, and free, offline play, it is one of the best games to help pass the time.
With a clean, minimal style, you can focus on your game and relax.
Play unlimited random decks for free! Play it your way, with 1 suit, 2 suits or even 4 suits. Learn the best strategies to track and improve your game statistics. Customize your cards, table and game mode to play Spider Solitaire just the way you like it!

Featuring:
* Classic Spider Solitaire gameplay
* Playable offline (no WIFI required once downloaded!)
* Landscape or portrait orientation
* Detailed player statistics
* Unlimited free undo
* Unlimited free hints
* Customizable card and table design
* Left-Handed Mode
* Tablet support
* Beautiful HD Graphics
* Artistic or Classic cards and backgrounds

Not sure if Spider Solitaire for you? Well, if you like interesting card games, classic Solitaire or addicting puzzles, then Spider Solitaire is definitely for you. It’s easy to learn, yet gives you the freedom to control the difficulty level as you improve your skills. For some, Spider Solitaire is a classic. For others, it’s a brand new game. But in the end, Spider Solitaire is for everyone!
It’s difficult to sum up Spider Solitaire in just a few words, but the most common ones we hear from players are things like: “Fun”, “Addictive”, “Relaxing”, “Challenging”, “Good Brain Training”, “Perfect Time Killer”, “Awesome card game”

Spider Solitaire is a wonderful opportunity to train your brain, improve your problem-solving skills, relax and have fun! Return to the timeless PC classic as it comes to your phone so that you can play it anytime, anywhere!

We are continually improving our app and adding fun new features! Thanks again for playing, and as always If you have any suggestion please let us know at spidersolitaire-support@tripledotstudios.com

Play the best new FREE SPIDER SOLITAIRE card game now!
